meanings.definition: Forming a mental image or idea
meanings.sent1: The artist had a conceiving mind, always coming up with new creative ideas.
meanings.sent2: Her conceiving thoughts led to a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see his conceiving imagination at work during the art class.
meanings.sent4: Her conceiving mind was like a canvas, ready to be painted with endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The conceiving process of brainstorming can result in amazing inventions.

meanings.sent3: It was amusing how quickly they ended up conceiving after deciding to start a family.
meanings.sent4: The idea of conceiving new life brought immense happiness to the parents-to-be.
meanings.sent5: Conceiving a child is a miraculous event in the journey of parenthood.

meanings.sent1: His conceiving of the complex theory impressed his classmates.
